akn:content.akn:p: The activities the corporation has carried out, including the duties of the corporation described in ยง 38-1806.04, for the 3-month period ending on the date of the submission of the report, or, with respect to fiscal year 1997, the 6-month period ending on the date of the submission of the report;
An assessment of the use of funds or other resources donated to the corporation;
The results of the assessment carried out under ยง 38-1806.04(b)(3); and

A description of the goals and priorities of the corporation for the 3-month period beginning on the date of the submission of the report, or, with respect to fiscal year 1997, the 6-month period beginning on the date of the submission of the report.
